title: Understanding Social Change through Digital Evolution Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Evolutionary education in social fields for working professionals. Utilizes smartphone-based simulation tools. Provides real-time feedback through formative assessment

learning_goals: Evolutionary mechanisms (natural selection, genetic variation) can be explained through digital simulations
Simulation data can be analyzed to interpret patterns of social change from an evolutionary perspective
Adaptive phenomena occurring in intergroup interactions can be observed and evaluated through VR simulations
Evolutionary problem-solving strategies can be proposed based on data collected during the learning process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
